title: libguestfs uses an inappropriate default attach method

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/40222
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/4325ee3432c0e76aac021a7a646504b2114a3394
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 4325ee3432c0e76aac021a7a646504b2114a3394
Author: Richard W.M. Jones <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jul 16 16:24:11 2013 +0100

    Don't change the default attach-method
    
    Don't change the default attach-method.  The one configured by the
    libguestfs packager is supposed to be correct for all libguestfs
    users, and making ad hoc changes to it is not advisable.
    
    For more information, see:
    https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=984409#c8
    
    Fixes bug: 1220102
    Change-Id: Ie7726c37dd579e2c95b6156a9ddfdff9e855af83
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
